docs.snippet: Beleaguered New York Yankee Alex Rodriguez plans to fight through the appeals process any suspension or banishment Major League Baseball might hand down following its investigation into doping, his lawyer said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Beleaguered New York Yankee Alex Rodriguez plans to fight through the appeals process any suspension or banishment Major League Baseball might hand down following its investigation into doping, his lawyer said on Monday.

headline.main: Lawyer Says A-Rod Would Fight MLB Suspension
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Says A-Rod Would Fight MLB Suspension

docs.snippet: The body of former Chicago Cubs pitcher Frank Castillo was recovered by divers from an Arizona lake on Monday, a day after he was reported missing during a swimming trip, sheriff's officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The body of former Chicago Cubs pitcher Frank Castillo was recovered by divers from an Arizona lake on Monday, a day after he was reported missing during a swimming trip, sheriff's officials said.

headline.main: Body of Former Cubs Pitcher Recovered From Arizona Lake: Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Body of Former Cubs Pitcher Recovered From Arizona Lake: Sheriff

docs.snippet: Notorious mob boss James "Whitey" Bulger peered from behind dark glasses and a Boston Red Sox baseball cap at former FBI agent Robert Fitzpatrick the first time they met, and the agent realized this was no average informant....

docs.snippet: Ike Davis had a go-ahead RBI double in a three-run seventh inning, Daniel Murphy drove in three runs, and the New York Mets snapped a five-game skid against the Miami Marlins with a 6-5 victory Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ike Davis had a go-ahead RBI double in a three-run seventh inning, Daniel Murphy drove in three runs, and the New York Mets snapped a five-game skid against the Miami Marlins with a 6-5 victory Monday night.

headline.main: Murphy Has 3 RBIs to Lead Mets to Win Over Marlins
headline.print_headline: Murphy Has 3 RBIs to Lead Mets to Win Over Marlins

docs.snippet: The Detroit Tigers added some help for their shaky bullpen Monday, acquiring reliever Jose Veras from the Houston Astros for minor league outfielder Danry Vasquez and a player to be named....

docs.snippet: While Detroit has become a top emblem of U.S. urban economic decline with its recent bankruptcy filing, it remains a resilient and vibrant sports town....

headline.main: In Cash-Strapped Detroit, Few Question Sports Arena Funding

docs.snippet: Clint Hurdle grabbed the brim of his cap and ducked his head. When pressed about what pleased him the most about Pittsburgh's 9-2 win over St. Louis on Monday, a romp that propelled the resilient Pirates within a half-game of the NL Central lead, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Clint Hurdle grabbed the brim of his cap and ducked his head. When pressed about what pleased him the most about Pittsburgh's 9-2 win over St. Louis on Monday, a romp that propelled the resilient Pirates within a half-game of the NL Central lead, the manager thought for a moment and sighed.

docs.snippet: What you need to know for Monday: a pig rescue, celebrating classic books and a dark moment in Empire State Building history....
